title: 5 Bed Corner Lot in Copperleaf in Cherry Creek School District
posting_body: This house does not have from basement access.
Available furnished (extra) or Unfurnished.
This Beautiful Corner lot house features 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms with main level study and a loft with convenient first floor laundry.

Has expansive Gourmet Kitchen with Quartz Island and Designer Black Splash, upgraded lighting package, all new stainless steel appliances along with Big Pantry and mudroom, large Living room and a Dining room, rec rooms.
Remote Controlled 2 car extended garage with ample street parking for up to 5 cars.
Other Features:
- Corner Lot West facing House with ample sunlight from east, west and south.
- Beautiful Deck with great views, mountain views, huge fenced backyard.
- Cherry Creek District Schools within 10 min walking distance
- Mountain Vista Elementary School (1 Block Away)
- Sky Vista Middle School (1 Block Away)
- Eagle crest High School (1 Block Away)
- 3 more schools within a mile distance
- Cat and Dog Friendly (Pet Deposit required).
- Close Proximity to Dog Park.
- Arboretum with Gym, Sauna, Swimming Pool, Tennis Court.
- Stainless Steel Appliances: Gas Stove, Microwave, Refrigerator, Washer and Dryer, Dishwasher
- Schools under Cherry Creek School District:
- 25 mins drive to Airport
- 30 mins drive to Downtown Denver
- 20 mins drive to Denver Tech Center
- Close to fine dining and shopping malls (South land malls), Preschool and After Schools, Public Transportation and Nine Mile High Station.
Please contact me for scheduling showing and more details.
Deposit= $3975
Employer details 2 previous landlords references,
Full time job, Renter's insurance, Pet deposit/pet.
Good background history.
